message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a method for data representation and classification using contextual data points. This problem is closely related to machine learning and pattern recognition, which are covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. Specifically, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a supervised learning method for context learning and classification. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also likely as the proposed method can be applied to image classification tasks. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as the paper deals with learning representations of data for classification, which is a core problem in AI. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also possible as the paper deals with contextual data points, which are often used in natural language processing tasks. Finally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is another possible category as the paper proposes an iterative algorithm for optimizing the objective function, which can be seen as a form of optimization using neural or evolutionary methods.
